emiting.label: Sending
emiting.noGm: A GM must be online in order to enact this request.

manage.name: Manage Condition
manage.hint: Key held when dropping a condition to manage its duration.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Should your world use the Automatic Rune Progression Variant.

force.name: Force Update
force.hint: When enabled, the runes will always be updated based on actor level. When disabled only the runes that are currently at a lower value than what they should be for that level will be upgraded.

price.name: Subtract Rune Price
price.hint: Should fundamental rune prices be subtracted from the weapon price.

shield.name: Shield Rune
shield.hint: Should reinforcing runes also be added to shields.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Drag a condition while holding the defined keybind to open the condition manager allowing you to set its duration.

remove.name: Remove-Effect Shortcut
remove.hint: Using [Shift + Right Click] on effect icons in the effects-panel will instantly remove all their charges/counters/badges.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Should your world allow your players actors to be able to give inventory items to other player-owned actors.

effect.name: Include Effects/Conditions
effect.hint: Should players also be able to drop effects & conditions onto actors they do not own.

offline.name: Show Offlines
offline.hint: Display shared resources from offline users as well.

show.name: Display Tracker
show.hint: Should the resource tracker widget be displayed in your interface. Can be toggled on/off via controls on the left UI.

withContent.name: With Container Content
withContent.hint: When a container is moved from one actor to another, should its content go with it.

giveth.error: Something went wrong when trying to process a player Giveth request.

dialog.title: Giveth Item
dialog.prompt: How many items do you wish to giveth?

content.container: {source} giveth {item} and all its content to {target}.

timeout.label: Timeout (seconds)
timeout.tooltip: Time passed in your world before the resource value is decremented by 1
